title.narrative: Sustainability and Exit Plan for the Trade Capacity Enhancement Project (TRACE)

description.narrative: The project will support human resource capacity of the national EIF secretariat, provide operational support to the unit and facilitate monitoring of DTIS implementation matrix and trade mainstreaming. This phase will also be used to address some of the limitations and challenges encountered by the ministry in development of Tier II projects addressing supply side constraints.

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
